channel.title: P-Value-005 on Andrey Akinshin
channel.description: Recent content in P-Value-005 on Andrey Akinshin

item.title: 0.05 Evidence-based medicine from magic to the search for immortality
Convenient p=0.05
item.description: The value for which P = 0.05, or 1 in 20, is 1'96 or nearly 2; it is convenient to take this point as a limit in judging whether a deviation is to be considered significant or not. Deviations exceeding twice the standard deviation are thus formally regarded as significant.
